briefdescription.para: CFS External Applications Task (EA) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: CFS External Applications Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the RPR main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS External Applications (EA) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: External Applications application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) EA data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the EA application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by EA application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the EA application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the EA application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the EA application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates a child task that will call the external application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function terminates execution of the external application and child task

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function custom code that calculates the CPU utilization of the external application. If the utilization exceeds the specified threshold in platform config it sends an event.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: EA_WARN_APP_UTIL_EID will be sent if utiliztion exceeds threshold

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.

briefdescription.para: Process any commands EA has received.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads cmds from a pipe and routes them to the appropriate functions

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Process any app specific commands EA has received.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives commands specific to EA and takes appropriate action on them.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
